title: I’m Half a Million in Debt and Terrified (Hour 3)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Kristina Ellis discuss:

Digging out of $500k of debt,

529 plans,

Borrowing from a 401(k) to pay off credit cards,

Trying to cut losses after losing money on investments.


Gazelle – Terms & Conditions Apply. Visit www.ramseysolutions.com/gazelle for more information. Established by Pathward, N.A., Member FDIC.

Have a question for the show? Call 888-825-5225 Weekdays from 2-5pm ET
